title: Nadia Whittome – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nadia Whittome, the Labour MP for Nottingham East, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
Liz Truss is gone. Good riddance.
